title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for July 19
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for July 19
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Hancock Holding (HBHC). Hancock Holding Co.'s shares dropped after an earnings report for the first time in more than two years. The bank holding company's second-quarter earnings trailed analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey, even though revenue topped projections. Loan losses contributed to the shortfall.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
